sys_update_version.payload: truedefault1mdd7485e168301ca1076389630ceaad3508679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4fsp_instanceadmin2024-03-22 08:30:56c74a92d68301ca1076389630ceaad346164c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f164c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f1sp_instance_c74a92d68301ca1076389630ceaad346admin2024-03-22 08:32:08<url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{ "html": { "value": "<p> </p> <style> body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; background-color: #f5f5f5; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; } .container { max-width: 600px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); padding: 40px; text-align: center; } header img { max-width: 150px; height: auto; } h1 { color: #333; font-size: 28px; margin-top: 20px; } p { line-height: 1.8; color: #666; margin-bottom: 20px; } footer { margin-top: 20px; text-align: center; color: #999; font-size: 14px; } footer p { margin: 0; } </style> <div class="container"><header><img src="unite_university_logo.png" alt="Unite University Logo" /></header><main> <h1>Thank You for Applying to Unite University</h1> <p>Dear [Applicant's Name],</p> <p>On behalf of the entire admissions team at Unite University, we extend our heartfelt gratitude for choosing to apply to our esteemed institution. Your interest in joining our community of scholars is deeply appreciated.</p> <p>At Unite University, we strive to foster an environment that values academic excellence, personal growth, and community engagement. We are committed to providing our students with the tools, resources, and support necessary to thrive both inside and outside the classroom.</p> <p>Your application is currently being carefully reviewed by our admissions committee. We understand the time and effort you have invested in preparing your application, and we assure you that it will receive thorough consideration.</p> <p>Should you have any questions or require further assistance during the application process, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to support you every step of the way.</p> <p>Once again, thank you for choosing Unite University. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you to our campus!</p> </main><footer> <p>© 2024 Unite University. All rights reserved.</p> </footer></div>", "displayValue": "<p> </p> <style> body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; background-color: #f5f5f5; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; } .container { max-width: 600px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); padding: 40px; text-align: center; } header img { max-width: 150px; height: auto; } h1 { color: #333; font-size: 28px; margin-top: 20px; } p { line-height: 1.8; color: #666; margin-bottom: 20px; } footer { margin-top: 20px; text-align: center; color: #999; font-size: 14px; } footer p { margin: 0; } </style> <div class="container"><header><img src="unite_university_logo.png" alt="Unite University Logo" /></header><main> <h1>Thank You for Applying to Unite University</h1> <p>Dear [Applicant's Name],</p> <p>On behalf of the entire admissions team at Unite University, we extend our heartfelt gratitude for choosing to apply to our esteemed institution. Your interest in joining our community of scholars is deeply appreciated.</p> <p>At Unite University, we strive to foster an environment that values academic excellence, personal growth, and community engagement. We are committed to providing our students with the tools, resources, and support necessary to thrive both inside and outside the classroom.</p> <p>Your application is currently being carefully reviewed by our admissions committee. We understand the time and effort you have invested in preparing your application, and we assure you that it will receive thorough consideration.</p> <p>Should you have any questions or require further assistance during the application process, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to support you every step of the way.</p> <p>Once again, thank you for choosing Unite University. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you to our campus!</p> </main><footer> <p>© 2024 Unite University. All rights reserved.</p> </footer></div>" } }]]></widget_parameters></sp_instance><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c74a92d68301ca1076389630ceaad346"/></record_update>
